pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ecosystem Multifunctionality: Richness, Divergence, and Regularity // Analyzes and quantifies ecosystem multifunctionality with functions to calculate multifunctionality richness (MFric), multifunctionality divergence (MFdiv), and multifunctionality regularity (MFreg). These indices help assess the relationship between biodiversity and multiple ecosystem functions. For more details, see Byrnes et al. (2014) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12143 and Chao et al. (2024) doi:10.1111/ele.14336.
